https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/I42R5ZL68U6PctMBuH5OPJ7mqM.jpg After his retirement, french philosopher and bullfighting enthusiast Francis Wolff decides to embark on a journey to France, Spain and Mexico joined by two mexican filmmakers who hardly know anything about bullfighting, a culture whose days seem to be numbered. During their road trip, they encounter numerous personalities with whom they reflect on mankindâ€™s relationship with animals and nature, but most importantly on our relationship with death and the meaning of the ultimate journey: life itself. A Philosopher in the Arena
